27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ayyub bin Musa narrated from his father, from his grandfather, that the Messenger of Allah said :"There is no gift that a father gives his son more virtuous than good manners

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي أَدَبِ الْوَلَدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Disciplining The Son
